name: Fly O'Clock
description: Fly O’Clock is tiny, highly-addictive single & online multiplayer arcade endless jumper with innovative one-touch mechanics and unique pixel-art graphics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher, or Radeon 7000 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: All you need is 89 cents to enjoy a genius idea  You are a little fly and you have to jump by clicking down on your arrow keys over two clock hands, otherwise you will get smashed and the game is over.   Sounds easy, but it is not. You mostly start by clicking the down arrow the wrong moment.   But, with a bit training you achieve fast a higher jump counter, get achievements, level up (yes there is a great exp level up system) or compete against other nerve wracks on the multiplayer.  What I like:  + simple idea, perfect execution + price + little time waster + multiplayer + one key input + achievements + level-up system  What I don't like:  - it will stress you a lot and rage quitting predestined  If you can handle raging and you like competing against your own highscore or other players: this game is for you!  Highly recommended
